name: Support Eligibility for Unipark Installations
title: Support Eligibility for Unipark Installations
body:
Overview

The following Unipark installations fall outside of our support scope (unless it is a blocking account issue related to licensing - more details on that to come):

www.unipark.de (kw0791.customervoice360.com)
ww2.unipark.de (df1582.customervoice360.com) 
ww3.unipark.de (sr4501.customervoice360.com)

 

Note that there are other Unipark installations which are Eligible for support, example: eh1958.customervoice360.com,unipark.fhv.at
fy8232.customervoice360.com,unipark.uni-trier.de
ux2869.customervoice360.com,unipark.th-koeln.de

Solution

If you find your Unipark installation is not eligible for support, please ask them to use the unipark support:
Chat Bot: https://www.unipark.com/

Support KB: https://help.unipark.com/

and open a new ticket at
DE: https://www.unipark.com/kundensupport/
EN: https://www.unipark.com/en/support/

Summary

While some Unipark installations may not be eligible for direct support, Discover XI offers several resources to assist customers, including community forums, documentation, and the ATLAS Chat chatbot. Customers also have the option to switch to a supported installation.

FAQ

  1. What if my Unipark installation is not supported?
    You can use resources like community forums, documentation, and the ATLAS Chat chatbot for assistance. You also have the option to switch to a supported installation.
  2. How can I switch to a supported installation?
    You can reach out to our sales team for more information on switching to a supported installation.
  3. What is ATLAS Chat?
    ATLAS Chat is our internal chatbot that can provide additional information or resources to assist with your query.
